import React from 'react' import millify from 'millify' import { Typography, Row, Col, Statistic } from 'antd' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useGetCryptosQuery } from '../services/cryptoApi'; const {Title} = Typography; const Homepage = () => { const {data, isFetching} = useGetCryptosQuery(); const globalStats = data?.data?.stats; console.log(data ); if (isFetching) return 'Loading..'; return (
Global Crypto Stats
Top 10 Cryptocurrencies in the World <Link to="/cryptocurrencies">Show more</Link>
) } export default Homepage
